text: Egha Iesus mɨgɨa ghua ghaze, “Ia Judan arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko Farisiba, Iavzika! Ia bar ikuvigham! Ia ifavaribagh amir gumaziba! Ia, fomɨra itir Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, men moziba deraghvɨra dar kɨrmɨgha, egha gumazir arazir aghuibagh amizibar moziba deraghavɨra dar adiaribagh ami.
